languages.text: "Приветствую, Йегер. Нехватка провизии и порядка подтолкнули рекрутов к анархии. Вы должны были держать людей в надлежащем состоянии — жду объяснений".
"Greetings, Yeager. The lack of provisions and order here has driven the recruits to anarchy. You were supposed to keep the Guardsmen in good shape. I am waiting for an explanation."
languages.original_text: "Приветствую, Йегер. Нехватка провизии и порядка подтолкнули рекрутов к анархии. Вы должны были держать людей в надлежащем состоянии — жду объяснений".

traits.locale_text: "Greetings, Yeager. The lack of provisions and order has driven the recruits to anarchy. You were supposed to keep the men in good shape. I am waiting for an explanation".
"Greetings, Yeager. The lack of provisions and order has driven the recruits to anarchy. You were supposed to keep the men in good shape. I am waiting for an explanation".

"Greetings, Yeager. The lack of provisions and order here has driven the recruits to anarchy. You were supposed to keep the Guardsmen in good shape. I am waiting for an explanation."
"Greetings, Yeager. The lack of provisions and order here has driven the recruits to anarchy. You were supposed to keep the Guardsmen in good shape. I am waiting for an explanation."

languages.text: «Saludos, Yeager. La ausencia de provisiones y recursos han empujado a los reclutas a la anarquía. Debía mantener a la Guardia en buena forma. Espero su explicación».
languages.original_text: "Greetings, Yeager. The lack of provisions and order here has driven the recruits to anarchy. You were supposed to keep the Guardsmen in good shape. I am waiting for an explanation."

traits.locale_text: «Saludos, Yeager. La ausencia de provisiones y recursos han empujado a los reclutas a la anarquía. Debía mantener a la Guardia en buena forma. Espero su explicación».

languages.text: “向你致意，耶格尔。这个地方缺少给养、混乱不堪，所有新兵都陷入了无政府状态。你本该负责让帝国卫队保持良好的状态才对，我正在等着你的解释。”
languages.original_text: "Greetings, Yeager. The lack of provisions and order here has driven the recruits to anarchy. You were supposed to keep the Guardsmen in good shape. I am waiting for an explanation."

traits.locale_text: “向你致意，耶格尔。这个地方缺少给养、混乱不堪，所有新兵都陷入了无政府状态。你本该负责让帝国卫队保持良好的状态才对，我正在等着你的解释。”

languages.text: 「こんにちは、イェーガー。ここでの食料不足と秩序の欠落が新兵たちを無秩序へと導いている。お前は、ガーズマンを良好な状態に保つべきだった。説明しろ」
languages.original_text: "Greetings, Yeager. The lack of provisions and order here has driven the recruits to anarchy. You were supposed to keep the Guardsmen in good shape. I am waiting for an explanation."

traits.locale_text: 「こんにちは、イェーガー。ここでの食料不足と秩序の欠落が新兵たちを無秩序へと導いている。お前は、ガーズマンを良好な状態に保つべきだった。説明しろ」

languages.text: « Salutations, Yeager. La pénurie de provisions et l'indiscipline qui règnent sur cette planète ont plongé les recrues dans l'anarchie la plus complète. Vous étiez censée veiller à ce que les gardes restent en bonne santé, il me semble. J'attends vos explications. »
languages.original_text: "Greetings, Yeager. The lack of provisions and order here has driven the recruits to anarchy. You were supposed to keep the Guardsmen in good shape. I am waiting for an explanation."

traits.locale_text: « Salutations, Yeager. La pénurie de provisions et l'indiscipline qui règnent sur cette planète ont plongé les recrues dans l'anarchie la plus complète. Vous étiez censée veiller à ce que les gardes restent en bonne santé, il me semble. J'attends vos explications. »

languages.text: "Selamlar Yeager. Buradaki erzak eksikliği ve nizamsızlık, acemileri anarşiye sürüklemiş. Muhafızları zapturapt altında tutman gerekiyordu. Açıklama bekliyorum."
languages.original_text: "Greetings, Yeager. The lack of provisions and order here has driven the recruits to anarchy. You were supposed to keep the Guardsmen in good shape. I am waiting for an explanation."

traits.locale_text: "Selamlar Yeager. Buradaki erzak eksikliği ve nizamsızlık, acemileri anarşiye sürüklemiş. Muhafızları zapturapt altında tutman gerekiyordu. Açıklama bekliyorum."

languages.text: "Hallo, Yeager. Der Mangel an Rationen und Ordnung hier hat die Rekruten in die Anarchie getrieben. Ihr solltet die Gardisten in guter Verfassung halten. Ich warte auf eine Erklärung."
languages.original_text: "Greetings, Yeager. The lack of provisions and order here has driven the recruits to anarchy. You were supposed to keep the Guardsmen in good shape. I am waiting for an explanation."

traits.locale_text: "Hallo, Yeager. Der Mangel an Rationen und Ordnung hier hat die Rekruten in die Anarchie getrieben. Ihr solltet die Gardisten in guter Verfassung halten. Ich warte auf eine Erklärung."
